data.text: <xref>Resembling</xref> a <xref>snake</xref>. Long, thin and flexible; <xref>waving</xref> about in a snake-like manner.
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.

data.text: Like that of a <xref>snake</xref>; as, a snakelike tongue
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.
